name: NeoCandy
description: NeoCandy - this is rogue like action shooter in Pixel style.Make your way through the mazes. Destroy enemies. Choose ammunition and survive. First aid kits will allow you to have more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer: 32bit / 64bit Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
